page.title: 12 ******LAW AND ORDER******
page.content:
{OUR LOCAL POLICEMAN
Police Constable Daykin is our local policeman, he works in the villages of Willington, Repton and Findern. He travels around the villages on foot,his bicycle or sometimes in his car. To keep in contact with the police station he uses a two-way radio or public telephone.His working week can be anything between 34 and 64 hours per week.During P.C.Daykins off-duty periods another policeman takes care of the villages. In his pocket P.C.Daykin carries lots interesting and useful articles. He has several identical uniforms and he told us that he had arrested quite alot of people during his time as a policeman.
